features: 0.04-ounce Neutrogena Makeup Remover Eraser Stick to quickly fix makeup mistakes and remove stubborn makeup on-the-go
Gel pen is ideal for precision makeup removal and touch-ups on everything including lids, brows, and lips. Great for stray or smudged mascara, lipstick, eyeliner, and more
Formulated with Vitamin E, the makeup remover gel's formula is designed to gently target and erase stubborn makeup mistakes without accidentally taking off all the rest
The travel-friendly makeup eraser is small and conveniently packaged to carry in a makeup bag or purse and take anywhere for quick and easy on-the-go fixes and touch-ups
To use, keep a steady hand and swipe stick over makeup error for easy and quick removal
body.description: Perfect your makeup look with Neutrogena Makeup Remover Gel Eraser Stick. Formulated with vitamin E, this makeup eraser stick provides a gentle, nourishing touch as it removes and touches up makeup mistakes like smudged or stray mascara, lipstick, eyeliner, and more. It features a precise and versatile gel pen design that makes the makeup remover stick easy to erase mistakes on all areas without accidentally taking off the rest of your makeup. Compact and travel-friendly, this reusable makeup eraser is the perfect, on-the-go solution to makeup mistakes. To use, keep a steady hand and swipe stick over makeup error for easy and quick removal.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,676 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #1 in Makeup Cleansing Gels

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works like a charm. I can get rogue mascara of without messing up the rest of my eye makeup. I really like this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well but have a Q-tip at hand to wipe it
reviews.reviewText: Amazing product that can get your smeared mascara and eyeliner off easily without having to take the rest of your makeup off. Have a Q-tip handy to wipe the tip off if you have to clean up a bigger smear. I will be using this as long as I use eye make up which is forever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product inside will take off your make up but you need to apply it and remove the make up with a q-tip or something like it. The formula doesn’t just remove your mistakes. I had a revlon pen that just dissolved my make up and it was amazing. Unfortunately I can’t find it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this to use instead of Q Tips but really it doesn't work that great. It's greasy and leaves a shiny spot on your skin wherever you use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where have you been all my life?!?
reviews.reviewText: This is genius! No more Q-tips dipped in makeup remover or trying to use the edge of a tissue to remove a smudge of mascara only to spend the day trying to get rid of the feeling of lint in your eye. This is pure makeup magic and I'm buying a dozen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best thing than sliced bread!
reviews.reviewText: This is sooo convenient. You can bring it anywhere you go. I didn't even know that this existed but eye makeup seems to appear under my eyes throughout the day and this can get get rid of it in a flash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle on your skin
reviews.reviewText: This is the second Neutrogena makeup remover eraser stick that I’ve purchased, I use it that much. It’s great for removing the traces of leftover mascara the next day that you didn’t quite remove the night before. It’s gentle on the under eye skin that you want to protect at all costs. Sometimes I have to use it to clean up the eye shadow that falls from my brush when you are applying it. In my younger years I would use Vaseline and you’d see some shininess left behind after it was wiped off. Neutrogena wipes away clean, no traces left. One swipe and it’s gone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It’s a balm and doesn’t remove makeup.
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t do what it’s supposed to do. Similar to a lip balm consistency.
